hadiths.text: Sa'id al-Maqburi reported:I heard Abu Shuraih al-Khuzill saying: My ears heard and my eyes saw and my mind retained it, when Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) spok this, and he then narrated the hadith and made mention of this:" It is not permissible for any one of you to stay with his brother until he makes him sinful

chapter.eng-name: It is recommended to spend surplus wealth
